title: Enhancing Managerial Competencies in Pharmaceutical Regulations and Best Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical terminology and understanding of workflow processes
context.additional_context: Practical Training for Pharmaceutical Managers Combining Local Regulations and International Best Practices

learning_goals: Explain core provisions of Qatar's local pharmaceutical regulations (prescription drugs/narcotics management standards) with 80% accuracy
Present a three-step or more response protocol for regulatory violation scenarios through role-play simulations
Learners develop and submit at least five team-based best practice checklists applicable to real-world settings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
